metadata.name: New Virtual Smart Card Created Via TpmVscMgr.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "Tpmvscmgr.exe" to create a new virtual smart card.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\tpmvscmgr.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('tpmvscmgr.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('create')))

output.summary: Detects execution of "Tpmvscmgr.exe" to create a new virtual smart card.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage by an administrator Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/identity-protection/virtual-smart-cards/virtual-smart-card-tpmvscmgr
